General.Name: RBW Inc.
General.Description: RBW, Inc. operates as an integrated entertainment company in South Korea and internationally. The company offers customized production services, such as artist casting, artist training, and style consulting services. It also develops and produces its own artists; and provides music and album production, TV program planning and production, K-POP educational training and tour program, entertainment-business training program, and PR marketing agency services. The company was formerly known as RainbowbridgeAgency, Inc. RBW, Inc. was founded in 2010 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
